ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Umm... easy on the mana...
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah!  All i ever said about this song is that if you sit it regens faster. Sheesh i haven t memmed it in 6 months. /glare Harmonic And short but sweet, I agree
ygData.messageBody:
Bah! All i ever said about this song is that if you sit it regens faster.
Sheesh i haven't memmed it in 6 months.

/glare Harmonic

And short but sweet, I agree with Kevin. I don't want all our songs
mana-based. It doesn't fit how bards work. I'm not saying I don't like the
song ideas and think our new songs will be as good as they should be, I just
don't want to rely on mana to be able to do sing them. I think Dirge should
have had a timer reset like LH, HT, or DA instead of using our mana. When
they implemented the song, GZ said he only used mana to limit how often we
used it. It was not really a mana-based song, they just used mana as a
timer instead of doing it the right way (couldn't they keep the song slot
grayed out like divine aura until they wanted us to use it again?). And if
they did that right, we wouldn't even be talking about songs using mana
right now cause it never would have happened and we never would have thought
of it. Dammit that wasn't short or sweet =)

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> This song takes up to an hour to mana cycle.
> (And no, Shada, I'm not a caster, I don't sit my bard down ever)
> It takes an hour for 90%+ of the bard population to regain mana for
> this song, because I know I have hidden my 'Sit' button since I
> don't use it. Needless to say the song is a waste. It requires
> mana, but for the wrong reason.
